Class Jtest2

java.lang.Object
Jtesting.Jtest2
public class Jtest2 extends Object
A test class for validating the operations of the Questions and Answers system and its database interactions.

This class contains unit tests that verify the proper functionality of operations for managing questions and answers. The tests cover the following key operations:

  • Question validation and management
  • Answer management and operations
  • Database operations for questions and answers
  • Search and retrieval functionality

Each test method follows a consistent pattern:

  1. Setting up test data
  2. Executing the operations being tested
  3. Verifying the expected outcomes

All tests utilize database connections that are refreshed before each test execution to ensure test isolation.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp() throws SQLException
      Sets up the test environment before each test.

      This method initializes the database helpers, establishes database connections, and initializes the Questions and Answers managers.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      See Also:
      • DatabaseHelper.connectToDatabase()
      • DatabaseHelper2.connectToDatabase()

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach public void tearDown()
      Cleans up resources after each test.

      This method closes the database connections to ensure proper resource management and test isolation.

      See Also:
      • DatabaseHelper.closeConnection()
      • DatabaseHelper2.closeConnection()
